HediffDef.label: video game neuro-stimulator
HediffDef.description: A neuro-stimulator with the latest version of Cod Modern Fishing Simulator installed. Players can, at any time, access the game with a direct neural interface, totally immersing themselves into the peaceful, serene lake shore, casting their troubles and hook away. With its biogel nerve-link, internal signal pre-processor, and wide-spectrum sensors, this eye implant neurostimulator is better than all alphabet box game systems combined.

HediffDef.label: country music neuro-stimulator implant (obscure)
HediffDef.labelNoun: a neuro-stimulator implant with obscure country music
HediffDef.description: A neurostimulator with obscure country music written to it. When implanted, it allows the bearer to play millions of obscure and little-known songs from the country music genre, directly into the brain, with clarity akin to personally hearing the singer. It can be turned off or on, searched, and recalled at any time. \n Its library of albums runs the whole of the past three thousand six hundred years, from every culture of humanity and in every part of the galaxy, from Old Earth to the Core Worlds to the Galactic Rim. Makes you feel like a cowboy. You have no idea who the artists are but you swear you have heard them before.
